data.title: Luigi Pirandello – Documentary
data.meta_description: The Nobel Prize in Literature 1934 was awarded to Luigi Pirandello "for his bold and ingenious revival of dramatic and scenic art"
data.text:
Luigi Pirandello

Documentary

Your browser does not support the video tag.

A short clip of an interview in French with Luigi Pirandello after the announcement of his Nobel Prize in Literature 1934, in which Mr. Pirandello expresses his gratitude to his French readers.

From SF Veckorevy 1934-12-10.

To cite this section
